description.value:
As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Low-Light Vision], or you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Darkvision] if your ancestry already has low-light vision.

Special If your ancestry has neither low-light vision nor darkvision, you can take this ancestry feat a second time to gain darkvision. You can't retrain out of this feat.
